title: Hundreds of thousands march for tighter U.S. gun controls
text:
Hundreds of thousands march for tighter U.S. gun controls 12:07pm EDT - 01:12 
At least half-a-million Americans are rallying nationwide on Saturday for tighter gun laws in “March For Our Lives” protests led by survivors of the Florida school massacre, and sympathetic protests are being held worldwide..   
At least half-a-million Americans are rallying nationwide on Saturday for tighter gun laws in “March For Our Lives” protests led by survivors of the Florida school massacre, and sympathetic protests are being held worldwide. .  //reut.rs/2GkNIPO
